__TOC__

TraeMcCombs is the original founder or Themes.org and Linux.com, he played a key role in the pre-dawn of Sourceforge.net.  He currently does Drupal Themeing on a contract basis and enjoys and loves Ubuntu Linux, and is soon to be a contributing member of the Ubuntu Artwork team.
